item.title: Trump announces National Guard will be deployed in Memphis to fight crime
item.description: During a television interview, the president said that the Tennessee city is “deeply troubled.” The move follows similar use of the Guard in D.C.

item.title: Workers are getting fired, placed on leave over Charlie Kirk posts
item.description: Reactions to the conservative activist’s killing have become a litmus test for employers’ tolerance for political speech by employees, in public and p...

item.title: Trump vows to punish critics after slaying of Charlie Kirk
item.description: President Donald Trump and his staff blame “radical left political violence” for the killing of their friend and Republican activist.

item.title: Lutnick says Musk was ‘backward’ in cutting government
item.description: The commerce secretary said the billionaire’s efforts focused too much on reducing the workforce rather than targeting waste.

item.title: Tracking who Trump is appointing to fill key administration roles
